title: Video: Clock Opera – Once And For All
content: Clock Opera have featured on almost every ‘Sound of 2012’ list, well, aside from CitR’s that is. However that’s not to say they won’t be successful; they’ve got the backing of NME, the Guardian and with Everything Everything having just experienced such a wonderful twelve months, it seems inevitable that Clock Opera will go the same way. Their new video for Once And For All is pretty darn cute, fuck your cliched ‘Rihanna making out with some slick dude in a car-park’, who wants to watch that anyway? Documenting an elderly couple and the various intricacies of their ‘turbulent’ relationship, director Ben Strebel captures it all, wrinkles included. Suddenly growing old doesn’t seem so bad.
